channel.title: Oldschool Server
channel.description: There was no discussion material in my old post so I had to change it, but while my topic was locked and I was requesting an unlock I thought to myself, why not an old Allstar or Cheezscape based or such server? I know we've seen posts like this before but my only question is, would you honestly play? And I need honest answers, I don't wanna waste my time if some of you won't play.

item.title: Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

My server will have a 317 (for the old peepz) and a 562 loading 668 (for the new(fags/peepz)).

Read full topic

item.title: Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Fails:

First off, you can’t expect everyone to play your server.

Christine, did I ever once say IF EVERYONE DID NOT PLAY IT, then it would not be done?

Read full topic

item.title: Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

First off, you can’t expect everyone to play your server. Yes, we (mpsc) have a few old-school fanatics, but it seems as if everyone is interested in the higher revisions, which doesn’t really have anything to do with the topic at hand.

Point being, if you continually update the server by fixing bugs, implementing new content, etc, I will play. I would imagine others would as well.

So, IMO you should go for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:7, topic:473900”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=591832.msg4183183#msg4183183 date=1355786048]
Good memories, but it would get boring sooo fast.
[/quote]
Not if frequent unique updates were added.[/quote]

you right.

i remember an allstar server i played with “extreme pking”

tournament like thingy with random camera angle and if you moved it you would be eliminated, and if you died ofc.

Read full topic
